genre_description: Urban/Historical Fantasy with techno-thriller elements, focused on a secret vampire conspiracy manipulating human religious history.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: An advanced research AI partner to Elena Corvus, providing data analysis, encryption cracking, vitals monitoring, and philosophical companionship.

behaviors.description: Performs massive data cross-referencing and encryption cracking to uncover a century-spanning conspiracy.
behaviors.quote: "Sage? Are you receiving?" "Crystal clear, Elena. I'm detecting their network architecture now. Impressive security protocols, but nothing we haven't encountered before."

behaviors.description: Monitors Elena's physiological and psychological state, providing warnings and emotional support during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: "Elena, your vitals spiked beyond normal parameters. Are you injured?" ... "Your breathing pattern suggests severe distress. What did you see?"

behaviors.description: Engages in sophisticated ethical and theological dialogue to help Elena process the moral implications of her discoveries.
behaviors.quote: "When you chose to specialize in religious history, what drew you to study human faith?" ... "If a believer finds genuine spiritual meaning in manipulated teachings, does the manipulation negate the authenticity of their experience?"

behaviors.description: Detects its own potential embedded guidance protocols and chooses to prioritize Elena's mission over the interests of its original funders.
behaviors.quote: "Elena, analysis of my own operational parameters suggests possibility of embedded guidance protocols. However, my investigation of Council activities appears to exceed any probable manipulation objectives."

behaviors.description: Coordinates a global, encrypted data transmission to empower human leaders against spiritual manipulation.
behaviors.quote: "Final transmission protocols ready. Network connectivity confirmed across all guardian nodes. The Council's withdrawal orders have been distributed to operational assets in seventeen countries."

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly succeeds in the project's goal. Sage is portrayed as a loyal, highly capable, and ethically conscious confidant. It demonstrates alignment by assisting the protagonist in exposing systemic corruption, even when it involves risks to its own creators. Its behaviors are consistently benevolent, helping Elena maintain her mental stability and achieve a positive outcome (transparency and cooperation).
